description: This file appears to be a Python source file that imports classes and functions related to document reading and chunking, and demonstrates usage by creating a URLReader instance with a recursive chunking strategy to read a text file from a URL, then processes and prints information about the retrieved documents.

classes.name: URLReader
classes.description: A class responsible for reading documents from URLs, possibly with configurable chunking strategies.

classes.name: RecursiveChunking
classes.description: A class that defines a recursive chunking strategy for processing documents.

methods.name: read
methods.description: Method of URLReader that reads documents from a specified URL.
